info.text: La catégorie par défaut pour les questions partagées dans le contexte « Test anglais CI ».

questiontext.text: Have you ..... your new car, yet?
Angela and Jacob have been together ..... 5 years.
I ..... here for most of the morning and he still hasn't arrived.
I think Kandinsky's paintings are just ..... those by Degas.
..... the fact she'd lived in the same building for 5 years, she knew none of her neighbours.
How ..... does a standard room cost at that hotel?
He'll leave for school as soon as he ..... ready.
Sarah stopped ..... to please everyone and focused on what she wanted instead.
Yesterday, the boss ..... not to pursue business in that country, due to civil unrest.
If you had presented the idea yesterday, it probably ..... very popular.
Please return the book ..... you've finished with it.
We need to leave the trade fair ..... 7 pm.
The school ..... I attended last year is in the town centre.
Jane's behaviour has improved: it's much ..... than last year.
I'm going to the cafeteria: would you like me to get you ..... cup of coffee too?
..... part-time is much more difficult nowadays.
What is suggested about the car?

answer.text: It has had more than one owner.
It has been on sale for six months.

questiontext.text: According to the advertisement, why is Ms. Ghorbani selling her car?

answer.text: She cannot repair the car’s temperature control.
She would like to have a newer model.

questiontext.text: What is suggested about Mr. Bach?

answer.text: He has been to Kansai more than once.

questiontext.text: At 12:15, what does Mr. Otani mean when he writes, “Sure thing”?

answer.text: He has confirmed the arrival time of a flight.
He is certain he will be able to find a parking place.
He agrees to wait at the door near the customs area.
He knows Mr. Bach must pass through customs.

questiontext.text: What is indicated about advertising space on the Mooringtown Library notice board?

answer.text: It can be used for any length of time.
It is open to all area businesses.
It is intended mainly for sporting events.

questiontext.text: What is NOT a stated requirement for a notice to be placed on the board

answer.text: It must be marked with posting dates.

questiontext.text: What should an advertiser bring to the library when making a submission?
What is suggested about Mr. Benavidez ?

answer.text: He has hired Salinas Products to distribute his products.
He has agreed to sell his business to Salinas Products.
He has recently been hired as an employee of a school.
He has been chosen to be the new president of Salinas Products.

questiontext.text: According to the article, where is Mr. Benavidez from?
What is indicated about the Pablo’s restaurant chain?

answer.text: It was recently sold in an auction.

questiontext.text: In this shop they are trying to
Starbucks opened its first shops in
Starbucks did not open in Italy until now because

answer.text: the founder had taken inspiration from Italian cafeterias
there are very few Starbucks in Europe

questiontext.text: The tourists are waiting in line to get into
The Italian shop is located in
This document is
It deals with

answer.text: the opening of the first Starbucks café in the world
the opening of the first Starbucks café in Italy
the opening of the first Starbucks café in Europe
the opening of the first Starbucks café in Seattle

questiontext.text: This Starbucks looks like all the other Starbucks shops.
In this shop you can get all the usual Starbucks drinks such as Frapuccinos.
The prices are similar to the other Starbucks shops.
Coffee is expensive in Italy.
